üç™ Cookie Policy

Learn about how we use cookies to improve your experience on Zuzu Sport. We're committed to transparency and your privacy.

üîê GDPR Compliant ‚Ä¢ üõ°Ô∏è Child-Safe ‚Ä¢ ‚öôÔ∏è Customizable Settings

What Are Cookies?

Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and analyzing how you use our site.

Kid-Friendly Explanation: Think of cookies like a bookmark that helps websites remember what you like, so they can show you things that might interest you next time you visit!

Types of Cookies We Use

üîß Essential Cookies

These cookies are necessary for our website to function properly. They enable basic features like navigation and access to secure areas.

Status: Always Active (Cannot be disabled)

üìä Analytics Cookies

These help us understand how children and parents interact with our app, so we can make it better and safer.

Status: Optional (You can choose)

‚öôÔ∏è Functional Cookies

These remember your preferences like language settings and provide enhanced, personalized features.

Status: Optional (You can choose)

üéØ Marketing Cookies

We DO NOT use marketing cookies as we prioritize child privacy and safety above all else.

Status: Not Used (Child Safety First)

Cookie Management

üõ†Ô∏è Customize Your Cookie Preferences

Essential Cookies

Required for website functionality

Always On

Analytics Cookies

Functional Cookies

Third-Party Cookies

üõ°Ô∏è Child Safety First

We minimize third-party cookies to protect children's privacy. The only third-party services we use are:

  • App Store Analytics: To understand app performance (Apple & Google)
  • Crash Reporting: To fix bugs and improve safety
  • Parental Communication: For support and important updates

Your Rights

‚úã Right to Object

You can object to our use of cookies at any time through your browser settings or our cookie banner.

üóëÔ∏è Right to Delete

You can delete cookies from your browser at any time. We'll respect your choice immediately.

üìã Right to Information

You have the right to know what cookies we use and why. This policy provides full transparency.

üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶ Parental Control

Parents can manage cookie settings for their children's accounts through our parental controls.

Browser Settings

You can also manage cookies through your browser settings. Here's how to do it in popular browsers:

üåê Chrome

Settings ‚Üí Privacy and Security ‚Üí Cookies and other site data

ü¶ä Firefox

Preferences ‚Üí Privacy & Security ‚Üí Cookies and Site Data

üß≠ Safari

Preferences ‚Üí Privacy ‚Üí Manage Website Data

üåä Edge

Settings ‚Üí Site permissions ‚Üí Cookies and site data
